name: Bibimbap
description: Bibimbap is a beloved Korean dish consisting of a bowl of rice mixed with an assortment of vegetables and chili pepper paste. Soy sauce is also added to give the dish a savory flavor.

name: Bulgogi
description: Bulgogi is a popular Korean dish made by marinating thinly sliced beef or pork and grilling it on a barbecue or stove-top griddle, resulting in a savory and delicious flavor.

name: Japchae
description: Japchae is a Korean dish consisting of stir-fried sweet potato starch noodles with vegetables, beef, and soy sauce, resulting in a savory, slightly sweet flavor.

name: Kimchi
description: Kimchi is a traditional Korean side dish made from salted and fermented vegetables, usually napa cabbage and Korean radish, with a variety of seasonings.

name: Kimbap
description: Kimbap is a Korean dish consisting of seaweed and rice rolled together with vegetables, egg, and meat, then sliced into bite-sized pieces for serving.

name: Samgyeopsal
description: Samgyeopsal is a Korean grilled pork belly dish that is usually grilled at the table and served with lettuce leaves and a variety of condiments.

name: Tteokbokki
description: Tteokbokki is a beloved Korean street food prepared with chewy rice cakes, fish cakes, and a spicy red pepper sauce, resulting in a flavorful and satisfying snack or meal.

name: Haemul Pajeon
description: Haemul Pajeon is a delicious Korean pancake made with scallions and various seafood like shrimp, squid, and oysters, creating a savory and crispy dish served with soy sauce and vinegar dipping sauce.
